name: pwa-app-manifest
description: Understanding the manifest.json file stucture and it's importance

scripts.minifyJS: uglifyjs public/src/js/promise.js public/src/js/fetch.js public/src/js/idb.js public/src/js/utility.js public/src/js/app.js -o prod/src/js/app.min.js -c -m --no-annotations && uglifyjs public/src/js/feed.js  -o prod/src/js/feed.min.js -c -m --no-annotations
scripts.prodSW: workbox injectManifest workbox-config-prod.js && uglifyjs public/workbox-sw.js public/src/js/idb.js public/src/js/utility.js prod/service-worker.js -o prod/service-worker.js -c -m --no-annotations
scripts.prod: rm -rf prod && cp -r ./public/ ./prod && find ./prod -type f -iname \*.js -delete && npm run minifyJS && cp ./public/src/js/material.min.js ./prod/src/js/ && npm run prodSW

author: Nilanjan Deb
